page.title: 04AVALON HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: {Avalon}is a completely new concept in leisure, health and beauty. It lies in its own valley in peaceful surroundings, looking over the Bristol Channel. You can swim in or relax beside the heated indoor swimming pool, and on sunny days enjoy the natural sun, lounging on the poolside patio. Avalon has a spa pool and a natural wood sauna cabin. There is also a steam room, special exercise equipment and sun beds. It also has its own resident beautician. You can enjoy eating and drinking at the snack bar which is open from 10am until 10pm every day except Monday. A three hour session costs Â£5 or you can spend the day at Avalon for Â£15. Avalon is open to anyone over the age of 18. { }
